document.full_text: a surge of water not seen since the great mississippi flood of 1927 is forecast in coming days to test the enormous levees lining the mississippi river on its course through the deep south.
document.title: south: mississippi: river surge to test levees
lines_and_colors: a surge of water not seen since the great mississippi flood of 1927 is forecast in coming days to test the enormous levees lining the mississippi river on its course through the deep south.
